mapper.insert: INSERT INTO userinfo (USERID, USERNAME, GENDER, PHONE, BIRTHDAY) VALUES (#{userid}, #{username}, #{gender}, #{phone}, #{birthday})
mapper.select: SELECT USERID, USERNAME, GENDER, PHONE, to_char(BIRTHDAY, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS BIRTHDAY FROM userinfo WHERE userid = #{userid}
SELECT USERID, USERNAME, GENDER, PHONE, to_char(BIRTHDAY, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS BIRTHDAY FROM userinfo ORDER BY username
